page.title: 14PET OWNERSHIP SKEGNESS
page.content:
Many people in Skegness own pets of one sort or another.Dogs are a favourite and people can often be seen walking them on the golf course or beach.A census was carried out in class2 (2nd yr infants) of Richmond C.P. School.There are 36 children in the class and they own : 36 fish,16 cats,13 dogs,9 rabbits,8 budgies,4 toroises,4 hamsters,1 guinea pig,1 duck,1 crab and 1 snake. { {My tortoise's name is Tommy.He eats {lettuce and tomatoes and cucumber and {beans when they are little.He has a {brown shell.He is a humbug.He eats {my pansies.}
{Ruth English (aged6)}
